Package org.concordia.macs.Utilities

Class PlayersGameplay

java.lang.Object
org.concordia.macs.Utilities.PlayersGameplay
public class PlayersGameplay extends Object
PlayersGameplay class manages the player perspective.

  • Method Details

    • assignCountries

      public static int assignCountries(ArrayList<Player> playersArray, ArrayList<Country> countryList, ArrayList<Continent> continentList)
      Assigns countries randomly to players at the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
      playersArray - the list of players in the game
      countryList - the list of countries on the map
      continentList - the list of continents present in the map
      Returns:
      0 if successful, 1 for errors

    • assignArmiesToPlayers

      public static void assignArmiesToPlayers(ArrayList<Player> playersList)
      Assigns armies to players at the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
      playersList - the list of players

    • showPlayersCountry

      public static ArrayList<String> showPlayersCountry(Player player, int displayFlag)
      Displays the countries owned by a particular player.
      Parameters:
      player - the individual player
      displayFlag - the flag indicating whether to display or not
      Returns:
      list of countries

    • checkArmyAvailable

      public static boolean checkArmyAvailable(int army, Player player)
      Checks whether the player has enough armies available.
      Parameters:
      army - the number of armies left with the player
      player - the player object
      Returns:
      true if army is available, false otherwise

    • advance

      public static int advance(Player p_player, ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, Country p_fromCountry, Country toCountry, int p_troops, ArrayList<Continent> p_continent, Connectivity p_connectivity, int p_fortifyFlag)
      Advances troops to a country belonging to the same player or attacks if the country doesn't belong to the player.
      Parameters:
      p_player - the individual player
      p_playersArray - the list of players
      p_fromCountry - the country from which troops are advanced or attacked
      toCountry - the country to which troops are sent or attack happens
      p_troops - the number of troops to be sent or used for attacking
      p_continent - the list of continents
      p_connectivity - the map connectivity
      p_fortifyFlag - the flag indicating the fortify phase
      Returns:
      0 for successful advance/attack and 1 for failed advance/attack

    • attack

      public static int attack(Player p_player, ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, Country p_fromCountry, Country p_toCountry, int p_troops, ArrayList<Continent> p_continent, Connectivity p_connectivity)
      This method handles an attack on another country.
      Parameters:
      p_player - The attacking player.
      p_playersArray - The list of players.
      p_fromCountry - The country from which the attack is launched.
      p_toCountry - The country being attacked.
      p_troops - The number of troops used in the attack.
      p_continent - The list of continents.
      p_connectivity - The map connectivity.
      Returns:
      0 for a successful attack, 1 for a failed attack.

    • removeCountry

      public static int removeCountry(ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, Country p_country, ArrayList<Continent> p_continent)
      This method removes a country from a player or from the neutral country list.
      Parameters:
      p_playersArray - The list of players.
      p_country - The country to remove.
      p_continent - The list of continents.
      Returns:
      0 for successful removal, 1 if failed.

    • bomb

      public static int bomb(Player p_player, ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, Country p_toCountry, ArrayList<Continent> p_continent)
      This method is used to bomb one country when the other player uses the bomb card.
      Parameters:
      p_player - The player performing the bomb action.
      p_playersArray - The list of players.
      p_toCountry - The country being bombed.
      p_continent - The list of continents.
      Returns:
      The number of armies left on the target country after the bombing.

    • updateContinent

      public static int updateContinent(ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, ArrayList<Continent> p_continentList)
      This method is used to update continent list of players if country gets added or removed.
      Parameters:
      p_playersArray - The list of players.
      p_continentList - The list of continents.
      Returns:
      0 after successful update.

    • AirliftDeploy

      public static boolean AirliftDeploy(String p_sourceCountryObj, String p_targetCountryObj, int p_armiesToAirlift, Player p_player)
      This method is used to airlift armies from one country to another once the player uses airlift card.
      Parameters:
      p_sourceCountryObj - The source country for airlifting armies.
      p_targetCountryObj - The target country for airlifting armies.
      p_armiesToAirlift - The number of armies to airlift.
      p_player - The player performing the airlift action.
      Returns:
      True if the airlift action was successful, false otherwise.

    • Blockade

      public static boolean Blockade(String p_sourceCountryObj, Player p_player, ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, ArrayList<Continent> p_continent)
      This method is used to make a country neutral and increase its army count once the player uses blockade card.
      Parameters:
      p_sourceCountryObj - The country to be made neutral.
      p_player - The player performing the blockade action.
      p_playersArray - The list of players.
      p_continent - The list of continents.
      Returns:
      True if the blockade action was successful, false otherwise.

    • generateCard

      public static String generateCard()
      This method will generate random cards and adds to players if player capture the new territory.

    • winnerPlayer

      public static Player winnerPlayer(ArrayList<Player> p_players, Connectivity p_connectivity)
      This function decides the winner of tha game
      Parameters:
      p_players - array of players
      p_connectivity - map content
      Returns:
      returns the winner of the game

    • negotiate

      public static void negotiate(Player p_player, ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray, String p_toPlayerID)
      This method adds diplomacy between two players if any of the used diplomacy card
      Parameters:
      p_player - refers to the player.
      p_playersArray - refers to the players Array.
      p_toPlayerID - refers to other player ID with whom diplomacy is set

    • resetDiplomacy

      public static void resetDiplomacy(ArrayList<Player> p_playersArray)
      This method will remove diplomacy between players after each turn
      Parameters:
      p_playersArray - refers to the players Array.

      public static void addNeutralCountry(Country c)

      Parameters:
      c - refers to the country.
